Title: Enemy of the State
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Debora Cahn, Alex Gansa, Anya Leta (staff writer)
Actors: Claire Danes, Elizabeth Marvel, Maury Sterling, Linus Roache
Plot: Carrie has left her job in the White House and moved back to D.C. and is living with her sister Maggie to take on the Keane administration.
